metadata.title: CVE-2023-52425 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows a denial of service (resource consumption)because many full reparsings are required in the case of a large token forwhich multiple buffer fills are needed.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
xmlrpc-c package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gdcm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
matanza: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
tdom package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
